prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who crowns Israel with glory — let my work bring You honor.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 37:5: "Commit your way to the Lord; trust in Him and He will act."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 24:27: "Prepare your work outside; get everything ready, then build your house."
prayer.intention: Guide my hands today as I build — let every line of code, every decision, every conversation serve Your purposes.
prayer.closing: The Lord goes before you today. He will be with you; He will never leave you nor forsake you. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged.
